INVITATION TO THE CHALLENGE GRADUATION EVENT
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your commitment and contribution to The Challenge this summer. We would love for you to celebrate with us at The Challenge graduation ceremony where you can see the effect your work has had on the young people involved.
You are warmly invited to The Challenge Graduation ceremony.
We'd love to know if you are coming.
RSVP by clicking on the following link: http://www.clicktools.com/survey?iv=3a132cae1853d4e&q1={!Contact.Id}&q2=1
Where: The Great Hall University of Birmingham Edgbaston Birmingham B15 2TT
When: 24/10/2011
13:30 - 17:00
